data.text: @EveExamines @mk21044 @KashPrime If you aren’t stocked up on N95 masks and tests this is the time to get them. My family has been fortunate not to get COVID but we use the masks and tests religiously along with being vaxxed.
@KashPrime "Please please please, don't shut the spotlight on me"

@KashPrime @mk21044 Sometimes people avoid CoVId because they’re healthy. Cellular excitation is required for an infection. Vitamin D and other factors help stabilize cells. Red light refreshes the cytochrome c oxidase enzyme. 

Distribute vitamins and heat lamps, not despair.

@KashPrime Are you in mask business???
Enough. Stop already. 
We can’t hide for the next 5,10,20 or 100 years. 
If you think you are in so much danger take care of yourself but let others be.
@KashPrime Really?  This is like the WORST analogy I have ever seen.  So 100% of kids in this graphic under 5 who get "wet" die?

@mk21044 @KashPrime You should wear an N95 mask for the rest of your life and stay away from any crowds.  Or other people in general.  The best is to get on the space station probably although the risk of getting rocketed into space might be almost as high as COVID.
@KashPrime You're nothing but a fear mongering.
@KashPrime Buddy your 15 minutes of fame are over. Enough.
@KashPrime @bruce_arthur guess some docs think the vax you love so much isn’t good enough, weird. But hey he’s a doctor and you’re a..you’re a doctor right?
